transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church has strong ideas. They talk about many issues, like marriage for same-sex people, abortion, and birth control. Some people feel the Church's ideas are old. They think the Church should change.

Some people leave the Church because they do not agree with these ideas. They think the Church should be more accepting. For example, some people think the Church should allow abortion. Others think priests should be able to marry.

The Church says priests are married to God. But some people think priests should have a family life too. They say other people have jobs and families, so why not priests?

I think gay marriage is good. People should not be punished for who they love. Some people are born gay. It is not a choice.

It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can get married but two people of the same sex cannot.

I do not know a lot about this topic. But I think it is wrong to say that gay people cannot get married.

People are born different. Some are born straight, some are born gay. It is not a choice.

The government should not tell people who they can marry.

I think gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason not to let gay people marry.

Some people think gay couples are bad for families. But gay families are different. They are not the same as straight families. It is like two sides of a coin. They are different, but both sides are important.

There are many rights that go with marriage. For example, gay couples can share property. They can also make medical choices for each other. If a gay partner is sick, the other partner may not be able to visit them in the hospital. This is unfair.

Many studies show that gay couples are just as happy as straight couples. They have the same things in a relationship that make it work.

Gay couples are not asking to marry in a church. They want a legal marriage from the government. The government should not mix religion and law.

Some people say that marriage is against their religion. But the government should not make laws based on religion.

Gay marriage is like segregation. It is not fair to treat people differently because they are gay.

Gay couples are just like straight couples. They have the same kind of love and support. People worry about how gay parents will raise children. But studies show that children of gay parents are just as well-adjusted as children of straight parents.

The government should help make gay marriage legal in every state. This would be fair to all people.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs that are good for people. Some drugs are not good for people. Some drugs are legal. Some drugs are not legal. 

Just because a drug is not legal does not mean it is not good for people.  Some drugs are good for people, but they are not legal. 

For example, there are drugs called oxycotton, Vicodin, and Perocets. These drugs help people, but they are not legal for everyone. They are for people who need them.

I think marijuana should be legal for people who need it. It can help some people. 

Alcohol is legal, but it can be bad for people. Marijuana can be bad too, if people use too much.

I think marijuana should be legal slowly. We need to learn more about it first. 

People think marijuana is bad. This is because it is not legal. But marijuana is not as bad as some other drugs.

If people know more about marijuana, they will use it better. Some people need marijuana to feel better.

The church is different now. It is not as strict as before. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends at church on the weekends.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is short, about thirty minutes. People dress more casually. In summer, some people wear beach clothes. Families come in late sometimes.

At the morning mass, people wear jeans and khakis. It is more casual now.

These are the biggest changes I see in the church.


About the priests, I do not think changing the rules would have stopped bad things from happening.

Some married men are bad too. They have bad thoughts about children. Even if priests were married, some would still be bad.

It is their choice to be a priest. Some religions allow married priests.

If someone wants to be married and practice their faith, they should look at other religions.

The Iraq War began after the September 11 attacks.  Many people think the Bush leaders made bad choices. They said Iraq was bad and had weapons. This was not true.  

The Bush leaders did not tell the truth to the people. Colin Powell said he did not believe the information when he showed it to the world. This is wrong. They broke the rules of the country. 

The Bush leaders wanted to fight a war.  The leader of the country’s money said the Bush family wanted to fight. They wanted to get more oil. 

The war has gone on too long. If we leave now, there will be fighting in Iraq.  

The United Nations wants other countries to help.  But this is a problem too. Iraq needs to be in charge of itself.  

The leaders in Iraq do not work well together.  There are many groups fighting for power.  This makes it hard to have peace.

The war in Iraq is hard to talk about. It is not a real war. The government did not say it was a war. I think it was wrong to go to Iraq. We went to get back at them because they did the bad things on nine eleven. 

I do not like the war. It is not good. We are there to help them make a democracy, but it is not easy. It will take time. 

If we leave, they will be mad. If we stay, we will need to help them build a good government.

Staying there is bad. It is not fair to the people in Iraq.

We should help them, but it is hard. It is like the Vietnam war. People call it a bad war. President Bush will be sad because of this war.

I know people who have family in Iraq. I want them to come home safe. But the war is hurting Iraq. It is hard to say what to do.

I think people in Iraq are different from us. We should not try to make them like us. It is bad.

The war will go on for a long time. That is sad.

I do not think it is right to make this act legal. It should not be legal in any state. I think it is up to the churches. The Constitution says that there must be separation of church and state.  This is clear. I think that trying to make a law about this would be against the Constitution.

I think that people who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's belief over another. Most Catholics and Christians are against it. They do not support it. I do not think the government should decide what churches can and cannot do. 

The separation of church and state is very important. It allows for religious freedom in the United States.  Even if they try to make an amendment, it would be wrong. It would be against what is already in the Constitution. It would also be one of the only amendments that restricts people rather than the government. I do not think this is right.

The federal government should not be involved in this issue. I do not know why he wants to make this amendment. It seems like it is against his own beliefs as a Catholic. His push for this amendment shows that he prefers one religion over others. 

I think it is up to the churches to decide this, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to make an amendment about this. I do not see how it will hurt the economy. It might even help society.

The war in Iraq is a hard thing. I do not think the government told the people the real reasons for the war. I think they tried to say the war was about the attacks on September 11, 2001, but it was not. The government made it seem that way to make people angry and want to fight. The war started in 2003.

I do not like war. I think it is wrong to start a war before someone attacks you.

The Iraq War is like the Vietnam War. The government should learn from its mistakes. Many American soldiers died in Vietnam and Iraq. They took away the government of Iraq, but they were not ready for what would happen next. 

The government tried to make a new government in Iraq, like they did in Vietnam.  They wanted to remove the old leaders and put in a democracy. But it is hard to do this. It takes a long time. 

The government did not plan well for what would happen after they took out the Iraqi government. They thought it would be quick and easy, but it is not. We are still there in 2006, and many soldiers are still dying. They are trying to teach the Iraqi police how to keep peace, but it is slow going. I think the government tricked the people into thinking it would be easy.

It is hard to leave now because we started this war.  We took away their government, so we should help them. But it is also hard to keep sending soldiers to die. How many is too many?

I do not think we should have gone to war in the first place. But if we are there, we should try to finish it.

Why did we go to Iraq? Some people say it is about oil. Maybe they wanted to control the oil. We knew North Korea had weapons, but we did not go to war with them. I think the government is not being honest with the people.

I hope there will be peace in Iraq someday.

I like gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a choice a person makes. It is good to be kind to all people. 

Some people say that being gay is not a choice. They say it is how a person is born. This is true. It is not fair to treat people badly because of who they love.

The government should not tell people who they can love. This is a private matter. My neighbors have friends who are gay. They live like other families. They walk their dog and care for each other.  

Some people in the government want to control marriage. They say they know what is best for everyone. I think this is wrong. 

People say that being gay is a medical thing. Maybe it is. Maybe it is how a person is born. It is not fair to tell people they cannot marry just because of this.

It is hard for gay people to get married. If a man and woman want to marry, they can do it easily. But if two men or two women want to marry, it is very hard. This is not fair.

Marriage is a private thing. It should be between two people who love each other. It should not be the government's business.

The internet is public.  

When you put things online, people can see them.

It can be bad if you write about bad things.  

School officials have to listen to reports about danger. If a student says something bad online, the school must act.

It is hard to know what is real and what is a joke.  Sometimes people say things online that they do not mean.

But the internet is for everyone to see. You must think before you post.  

If you do not want people to see something, do not post it online.

The war has been going for too long. At first, the goal was good. It was to help another country have democracy. But now, I think we have forgotten that goal. We may be fighting just to show that we are strong. 

I also think the reasons for starting the war were not good. The president's father had problems with Saddam Hussein before. So, maybe the war was not really about helping people.

If the goal was to help a country without a fair system, that would be a good reason to fight. But I think that reason has been lost. Now, it seems like we are fighting just to keep fighting. 

We showed our strength in the first few months. But the war has gone on for too long.

We should stop the war. The people in that country need to take care of themselves.

We spend too much money on the war. We have problems here at home, like poverty and bad schools. We should spend the money on these problems.

The war is hurting our country's money. We need to spend money on things like schools, roads, and health care. We should not spend money on war.

I have a question.

I want to know if it is bad that someone saw information on Myspace and stopped a bad thing from happening.

I think it is okay if people see things on the internet. If you put things on the internet, other people can see them.

But it is hard to say if it is right for one person to look at all the students' profiles.  It might be wrong to look at profiles to see if someone is doing something bad. It might be like picking on someone.

I use Facebook. I worry that bad people can see things about me. I saw a story about a man who found a girl's name and talked to her. He met her. That is scary.

I only talk to people I know on Facebook. I do not want to meet people I do not know.

It is hard to know who can see what on the internet. I try to be careful about what I put online. I want to talk to my friends, but I also want to stay safe.

I heard about a school that told students they could not use Myspace. I do not know if that is right. I think students should be able to use Myspace.

The Iraq War was a bad idea. Many people think so. Most people in the world think so. They think we should leave.  

Many Iraqis want us to leave too. Many American soldiers there also want us to leave. I think it has been bad from the start. It is hard to do good in the Middle East. It is different from the United States.  

Some people say Saddam Hussein was bad. He was. But we should think before we go to war. It is bad to hurt people. 

We need to leave Iraq. The people there want us to leave. They know best. It is better to let them decide.

Yes, I think gender is still a problem in the United States. It is not just a women's problem. It is a problem in many jobs. Women have a hard time. There is a "glass roof" that stops them. Even when they are equal, some men do not like to work for a woman. This is because of how society has always been. 

Sometimes women have all the skills for a job, but they do not get it. The board may not choose them because they think women are not good at high jobs. The same thing is true for men.

In some jobs, like taking care of children, it is not common for men to stay home. People think men should work and be the money makers. This can be hard on men who want to stay home.

In the fashion world, some people do not take men seriously if they are straight. This is because people think fashion is for women. Men who like fashion may be told they do not know enough.

I think people are working to make things better. It is slow, but people are accepting of women in higher jobs and men who stay home.

Decriminalizing marijuana is good. It is not a crime. It is a ticket. People get a ticket. They do not go to jail. This saves money. The government spends a lot of money on courts and jails. This money can go to other things, like schools and helping people.

Some places do not want to decriminalize marijuana. They think it is bad. Other places are okay with it. Denver is one place that is okay with decriminalizing marijuana. They make more money now.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is still bad to smoke in public. It is not good to drive after smoking. People feel bad about smoking marijuana. 

Alcohol is bad too. It makes it hard to drive. Both alcohol and marijuana are bad for people. People react to them in different ways. Some people use them too much.

I say yes because a lot of things they do are very old. They do the same things for a long time. This is good. But it is also good to change. Many Catholics go to Church every week. They are strict about how things are done. Sometimes, I think the Church looks down on people who do not follow the rules. They do not like people who are not perfect Catholics. They do not like people of other religions.

My dad was an Episcopalian. My mom was a Catholic. They could not get married in the Catholic Church because of my dad's religion. This is not being nice to other religions.

We always learn to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. But it is wrong to say you love others and then not accept them.

I think a lot of Catholic teaching tells you to do things. But the way they act goes against this. It is old. They keep doing it anyway.

Allowing priests to marry would be good. But it will not stop bad people. It is a different problem.

People who hurt children would probably do it even if they were married. It is wrong to hurt children. It is different from hurting a spouse.

This issue is hard for me. I am not sure what is right. 

I think this is a big problem. It is about the church and the state. It is also about how we say people can marry.

I think all unions should be the same. I do not know if the government should say what marriage is.

If you are baptized, the government does not care.

If you are married, the government should see it as a union.

Two people are together. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

I think gay marriage is the same.

If all states agree, they should make it a law for the whole country.

I think it is wrong to change the Constitution to say people cannot marry.

The Constitution is for big things.

This is important to some people. But it is not big enough to change the Constitution.

I am from a Christian family. 

Homosexuality is hard for me to understand. 

I have gay friends. I do not agree with their way of life. But I think they should be able to marry. 

Marriage should be a state decision, not a national one. Some states are Democratic, some are Republican. 

Democratic states want gay marriage. People who live in these states know how the state feels about this. 

If you live in a state that allows gay marriage, you should respect that.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. 

I think each state should decide about gay marriage.

I think the president should not decide for the whole country.

I do not agree with the president's ban on gay marriage.

The president does not live in every state. He should not tell states what to do.

Some things should be up to the states. 

The president will not be in office forever.

If a new president wants to allow gay marriage, it will cause problems.

It is better to let each state decide. They are the ones who will live with the decision.

Myspace is for the public. It is like a bulletin board. If you post something, others can see it. People can see it at home or at work. School officials can see it too.

If posting on Myspace can help stop a school shooting, that is good. The school has a duty to keep students safe.

Some people say looking at Myspace is an invasion of privacy. But I think it is okay if it helps keep students safe.

If a school looks at Myspace to find students drinking or smoking, that is wrong. They should not be looking for trouble.

But if they see something that shows a student is in danger, they should help. 

You should not post things on Myspace that you do not want others to see. 

Anything you post on the internet can stay there forever. Even if you delete it, someone might have saved a copy. 

Be careful what you post on the internet.

The war is bad. After nine eleven, I was very angry. I want to fight back. But now I think we made a big mistake. We went to war without a good plan.

We did not know what would happen. The war is very different there. They are not like us. They fight in a very bad way.

We should leave. It is not our place to change them. I think they will always fight. We should not stay there. We are hurting ourselves. 

We need to go home.

transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church has strong ideas. They talk about many issues, like marriage for same-sex people, abortion, and birth control. Some people feel the Church's ideas are old. They think the Church should change.

Some people leave the Church because they do not agree with these ideas. They think the Church should be more accepting. For example, some people think the Church should allow abortion. Others think priests should be able to marry.

The Church says priests are married to God. But some people think priests should have a family life too. They say other people have jobs and families, so why not priests?

I think gay marriage is good. People should not be punished for who they love. Some people are born gay. It is not a choice.

It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can get married but two people of the same sex cannot.

I do not know a lot about this topic. But I think it is wrong to say that gay people cannot get married.

People are born different. Some are born straight, some are born gay. It is not a choice.

The government should not tell people who they can marry.

I think gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason not to let gay people marry.

Some people think gay couples are bad for families. But gay families are different. They are not the same as straight families. It is like two sides of a coin. They are different, but both sides are important.

There are many rights that go with marriage. For example, gay couples can share property. They can also make medical choices for each other. If a gay partner is sick, the other partner may not be able to visit them in the hospital. This is unfair.

Many studies show that gay couples are just as happy as straight couples. They have the same things in a relationship that make it work.

Gay couples are not asking to marry in a church. They want a legal marriage from the government. The government should not mix religion and law.

Some people say that marriage is against their religion. But the government should not make laws based on religion.

Gay marriage is like segregation. It is not fair to treat people differently because they are gay.

Gay couples are just like straight couples. They have the same kind of love and support. People worry about how gay parents will raise children. But studies show that children of gay parents are just as well-adjusted as children of straight parents.

The government should help make gay marriage legal in every state. This would be fair to all people.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs that are good for people. Some drugs are not good for people. Some drugs are legal. Some drugs are not legal. 

Just because a drug is not legal does not mean it is not good for people.  Some drugs are good for people, but they are not legal. 

For example, there are drugs called oxycotton, Vicodin, and Perocets. These drugs help people, but they are not legal for everyone. They are for people who need them.

I think marijuana should be legal for people who need it. It can help some people. 

Alcohol is legal, but it can be bad for people. Marijuana can be bad too, if people use too much.

I think marijuana should be legal slowly. We need to learn more about it first. 

People think marijuana is bad. This is because it is not legal. But marijuana is not as bad as some other drugs.

If people know more about marijuana, they will use it better. Some people need marijuana to feel better.

The church is different now. It is not as strict as before. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends at church on the weekends.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is short, about thirty minutes. People dress more casually. In summer, some people wear beach clothes. Families come in late sometimes.

At the morning mass, people wear jeans and khakis. It is more casual now.

These are the biggest changes I see in the church.


About the priests, I do not think changing the rules would have stopped bad things from happening.

Some married men are bad too. They have bad thoughts about children. Even if priests were married, some would still be bad.

It is their choice to be a priest. Some religions allow married priests.

If someone wants to be married and practice their faith, they should look at other religions.

The Iraq War began after the September 11 attacks.  Many people think the Bush leaders made bad choices. They said Iraq was bad and had weapons. This was not true.  

The Bush leaders did not tell the truth to the people. Colin Powell said he did not believe the information when he showed it to the world. This is wrong. They broke the rules of the country. 

The Bush leaders wanted to fight a war.  The leader of the country’s money said the Bush family wanted to fight. They wanted to get more oil. 

The war has gone on too long. If we leave now, there will be fighting in Iraq.  

The United Nations wants other countries to help.  But this is a problem too. Iraq needs to be in charge of itself.  

The leaders in Iraq do not work well together.  There are many groups fighting for power.  This makes it hard to have peace.

The war in Iraq is hard to talk about. It is not a real war. The government did not say it was a war. I think it was wrong to go to Iraq. We went to get back at them because they did the bad things on nine eleven. 

I do not like the war. It is not good. We are there to help them make a democracy, but it is not easy. It will take time. 

If we leave, they will be mad. If we stay, we will need to help them build a good government.

Staying there is bad. It is not fair to the people in Iraq.

We should help them, but it is hard. It is like the Vietnam war. People call it a bad war. President Bush will be sad because of this war.

I know people who have family in Iraq. I want them to come home safe. But the war is hurting Iraq. It is hard to say what to do.

I think people in Iraq are different from us. We should not try to make them like us. It is bad.

The war will go on for a long time. That is sad.

I do not think it is right to make this act legal. It should not be legal in any state. I think it is up to the churches. The Constitution says that there must be separation of church and state.  This is clear. I think that trying to make a law about this would be against the Constitution.

I think that people who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's belief over another. Most Catholics and Christians are against it. They do not support it. I do not think the government should decide what churches can and cannot do. 

The separation of church and state is very important. It allows for religious freedom in the United States.  Even if they try to make an amendment, it would be wrong. It would be against what is already in the Constitution. It would also be one of the only amendments that restricts people rather than the government. I do not think this is right.

The federal government should not be involved in this issue. I do not know why he wants to make this amendment. It seems like it is against his own beliefs as a Catholic. His push for this amendment shows that he prefers one religion over others. 

I think it is up to the churches to decide this, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to make an amendment about this. I do not see how it will hurt the economy. It might even help society.

The war in Iraq is a hard thing. I do not think the government told the people the real reasons for the war. I think they tried to say the war was about the attacks on September 11, 2001, but it was not. The government made it seem that way to make people angry and want to fight. The war started in 2003.

I do not like war. I think it is wrong to start a war before someone attacks you.

The Iraq War is like the Vietnam War. The government should learn from its mistakes. Many American soldiers died in Vietnam and Iraq. They took away the government of Iraq, but they were not ready for what would happen next. 

The government tried to make a new government in Iraq, like they did in Vietnam.  They wanted to remove the old leaders and put in a democracy. But it is hard to do this. It takes a long time. 

The government did not plan well for what would happen after they took out the Iraqi government. They thought it would be quick and easy, but it is not. We are still there in 2006, and many soldiers are still dying. They are trying to teach the Iraqi police how to keep peace, but it is slow going. I think the government tricked the people into thinking it would be easy.

It is hard to leave now because we started this war.  We took away their government, so we should help them. But it is also hard to keep sending soldiers to die. How many is too many?

I do not think we should have gone to war in the first place. But if we are there, we should try to finish it.

Why did we go to Iraq? Some people say it is about oil. Maybe they wanted to control the oil. We knew North Korea had weapons, but we did not go to war with them. I think the government is not being honest with the people.

I hope there will be peace in Iraq someday.

I like gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a choice a person makes. It is good to be kind to all people. 

Some people say that being gay is not a choice. They say it is how a person is born. This is true. It is not fair to treat people badly because of who they love.

The government should not tell people who they can love. This is a private matter. My neighbors have friends who are gay. They live like other families. They walk their dog and care for each other.  

Some people in the government want to control marriage. They say they know what is best for everyone. I think this is wrong. 

People say that being gay is a medical thing. Maybe it is. Maybe it is how a person is born. It is not fair to tell people they cannot marry just because of this.

It is hard for gay people to get married. If a man and woman want to marry, they can do it easily. But if two men or two women want to marry, it is very hard. This is not fair.

Marriage is a private thing. It should be between two people who love each other. It should not be the government's business.

The internet is public.  

When you put things online, people can see them.

It can be bad if you write about bad things.  

School officials have to listen to reports about danger. If a student says something bad online, the school must act.

It is hard to know what is real and what is a joke.  Sometimes people say things online that they do not mean.

But the internet is for everyone to see. You must think before you post.  

If you do not want people to see something, do not post it online.

The war has been going for too long. At first, the goal was good. It was to help another country have democracy. But now, I think we have forgotten that goal. We may be fighting just to show that we are strong. 

I also think the reasons for starting the war were not good. The president's father had problems with Saddam Hussein before. So, maybe the war was not really about helping people.

If the goal was to help a country without a fair system, that would be a good reason to fight. But I think that reason has been lost. Now, it seems like we are fighting just to keep fighting. 

We showed our strength in the first few months. But the war has gone on for too long.

We should stop the war. The people in that country need to take care of themselves.

We spend too much money on the war. We have problems here at home, like poverty and bad schools. We should spend the money on these problems.

The war is hurting our country's money. We need to spend money on things like schools, roads, and health care. We should not spend money on war.

I have a question.

I want to know if it is bad that someone saw information on Myspace and stopped a bad thing from happening.

I think it is okay if people see things on the internet. If you put things on the internet, other people can see them.

But it is hard to say if it is right for one person to look at all the students' profiles.  It might be wrong to look at profiles to see if someone is doing something bad. It might be like picking on someone.

I use Facebook. I worry that bad people can see things about me. I saw a story about a man who found a girl's name and talked to her. He met her. That is scary.

I only talk to people I know on Facebook. I do not want to meet people I do not know.

It is hard to know who can see what on the internet. I try to be careful about what I put online. I want to talk to my friends, but I also want to stay safe.

I heard about a school that told students they could not use Myspace. I do not know if that is right. I think students should be able to use Myspace.

The Iraq War was a bad idea. Many people think so. Most people in the world think so. They think we should leave.  

Many Iraqis want us to leave too. Many American soldiers there also want us to leave. I think it has been bad from the start. It is hard to do good in the Middle East. It is different from the United States.  

Some people say Saddam Hussein was bad. He was. But we should think before we go to war. It is bad to hurt people. 

We need to leave Iraq. The people there want us to leave. They know best. It is better to let them decide.

Yes, I think gender is still a problem in the United States. It is not just a women's problem. It is a problem in many jobs. Women have a hard time. There is a "glass roof" that stops them. Even when they are equal, some men do not like to work for a woman. This is because of how society has always been. 

Sometimes women have all the skills for a job, but they do not get it. The board may not choose them because they think women are not good at high jobs. The same thing is true for men.

In some jobs, like taking care of children, it is not common for men to stay home. People think men should work and be the money makers. This can be hard on men who want to stay home.

In the fashion world, some people do not take men seriously if they are straight. This is because people think fashion is for women. Men who like fashion may be told they do not know enough.

I think people are working to make things better. It is slow, but people are accepting of women in higher jobs and men who stay home.

Decriminalizing marijuana is good. It is not a crime. It is a ticket. People get a ticket. They do not go to jail. This saves money. The government spends a lot of money on courts and jails. This money can go to other things, like schools and helping people.

Some places do not want to decriminalize marijuana. They think it is bad. Other places are okay with it. Denver is one place that is okay with decriminalizing marijuana. They make more money now.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is still bad to smoke in public. It is not good to drive after smoking. People feel bad about smoking marijuana. 

Alcohol is bad too. It makes it hard to drive. Both alcohol and marijuana are bad for people. People react to them in different ways. Some people use them too much.

I say yes because a lot of things they do are very old. They do the same things for a long time. This is good. But it is also good to change. Many Catholics go to Church every week. They are strict about how things are done. Sometimes, I think the Church looks down on people who do not follow the rules. They do not like people who are not perfect Catholics. They do not like people of other religions.

My dad was an Episcopalian. My mom was a Catholic. They could not get married in the Catholic Church because of my dad's religion. This is not being nice to other religions.

We always learn to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. But it is wrong to say you love others and then not accept them.

I think a lot of Catholic teaching tells you to do things. But the way they act goes against this. It is old. They keep doing it anyway.

Allowing priests to marry would be good. But it will not stop bad people. It is a different problem.

People who hurt children would probably do it even if they were married. It is wrong to hurt children. It is different from hurting a spouse.

This issue is hard for me. I am not sure what is right. 

I think this is a big problem. It is about the church and the state. It is also about how we say people can marry.

I think all unions should be the same. I do not know if the government should say what marriage is.

If you are baptized, the government does not care.

If you are married, the government should see it as a union.

Two people are together. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

I think gay marriage is the same.

If all states agree, they should make it a law for the whole country.

I think it is wrong to change the Constitution to say people cannot marry.

The Constitution is for big things.

This is important to some people. But it is not big enough to change the Constitution.

I am from a Christian family. 

Homosexuality is hard for me to understand. 

I have gay friends. I do not agree with their way of life. But I think they should be able to marry. 

Marriage should be a state decision, not a national one. Some states are Democratic, some are Republican. 

Democratic states want gay marriage. People who live in these states know how the state feels about this. 

If you live in a state that allows gay marriage, you should respect that.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. 

I think each state should decide about gay marriage.

I think the president should not decide for the whole country.

I do not agree with the president's ban on gay marriage.

The president does not live in every state. He should not tell states what to do.

Some things should be up to the states. 

The president will not be in office forever.

If a new president wants to allow gay marriage, it will cause problems.

It is better to let each state decide. They are the ones who will live with the decision.

Myspace is for the public. It is like a bulletin board. If you post something, others can see it. People can see it at home or at work. School officials can see it too.

If posting on Myspace can help stop a school shooting, that is good. The school has a duty to keep students safe.

Some people say looking at Myspace is an invasion of privacy. But I think it is okay if it helps keep students safe.

If a school looks at Myspace to find students drinking or smoking, that is wrong. They should not be looking for trouble.

But if they see something that shows a student is in danger, they should help. 

You should not post things on Myspace that you do not want others to see. 

Anything you post on the internet can stay there forever. Even if you delete it, someone might have saved a copy. 

Be careful what you post on the internet.

The war is bad. After nine eleven, I was very angry. I want to fight back. But now I think we made a big mistake. We went to war without a good plan.

We did not know what would happen. The war is very different there. They are not like us. They fight in a very bad way.

We should leave. It is not our place to change them. I think they will always fight. We should not stay there. We are hurting ourselves. 

We need to go home.

The Catholic Church must change some of its views. Many people are leaving the Church. This is because the Church is not accepting of some things. For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These views are old. The Church should think about new ideas. Then, it will not lose followers.

People disagree with the Church on these subjects. Some people think the Church is wrong. The Church is against abortion. If you want an abortion, you may not feel welcome in the Church.

The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you may not feel welcome in the Church. I think women can be priests. I think priests can be married. 

The Church says priests are married to God. But people have jobs and families. Priests can have both.

I support gay marriage. I think people are born this way. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are. It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can marry, but two people of the same sex cannot. I think the government should not tell people who they can love. It is a personal matter.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason to say no to it. Some people think that gay couples are bad for families. But that is not true. Gay couples are different, but that is okay. 

It is like two sides of the same coin. They are different, but they are still the same thing. Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. This includes things like taxes and health care.

If you are sick, your partner should be able to be with you. They should not be left out just because they are not married.

Many studies show that gay couples are happy. They have the same things in a relationship as straight couples do.

Gay couples are not asking to get married in a church. They just want a paper from the government.

The government should not mix with religion. If the government lets people have civil unions, they should let them have marriage too.

It is like segregation. It is not fair to treat people differently just because they are gay.

Gay couples can have children and be good parents. They can teach their children the same things as straight couples do.

Some people are afraid of how children of gay couples will be treated. But children should not be treated differently just because their parents are gay. They should be allowed to go to any school and be happy.

The government should help gay couples. It should make gay marriage legal in every state.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many medicines. Some medicines are good. Some medicines are bad. The law says some medicines are bad. This does not mean they are not good. Some bad medicines are good for sickness.

For example, many pharmacies use medicines like oxycotton, Vicodin, and Percocet. These medicines are strong. But they help people. We use them to help people feel better.

Marijuana is a bad medicine. The law says it is bad. But it can also help people feel better.  It can help with pain. It can help with sickness.

Some people say marijuana is like alcohol. Alcohol is bad if you use too much. Marijuana can be bad too. But marijuana is not as bad as alcohol.

I think people should use marijuana carefully. It should be legal for doctors to use.

People think marijuana is bad. This is because it is illegal. But it is not as bad as other bad medicines. If people use it carefully, it can be good.

The church has changed some. It is not as strict now as before. I went to church every Sunday when I was young. I would wear pretty dresses, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school and saw my friends at church on the weekends. Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually now, even in the summer. They come in their beach clothes. Families are late sometimes. Morning mass used to be very formal. Now people wear jeans and khakis.

I think the biggest change is how people dress. That is the main thing I have noticed. 

I do not know much about the problems the church has had. I do not know about politics in the church.

I do not think allowing women to be priests or letting priests marry would have stopped the bad things that happened. Some married men are bad people too. It is the person, not their marriage.  Some religions allow priests to marry. If people want to practice their faith and be married, they could try a different religion.

The Iraq War is bad. The Bush people said bad things about Iraq. They said Iraq had bad weapons. They said Iraq was bad for America. This is not true.

The Bush people lied to the people. They said Iraq was bad. They said Iraq was with people who did bad things on September 11th. This is not true.

Colin Powell said things to the United Nations. He said Iraq was bad. Now he says he did not think Iraq was bad. This is bad.

The Bush people did not care about the rules of the country. They wanted to go to war. They did not like Iraq. They wanted to take Iraq's oil.

The Iraq War is not good. Many people died.

We need to leave Iraq. But leaving is hard. Iraq may have a bad war.

Other countries can help. But this may be bad too. Iraq wants to be its own country.

The government in Iraq is not good. They cannot make good choices. Bad people are fighting for power.

The Iraq War is bad news.

The war in Iraq is hard to talk about. It is not a real war because Congress did not say it was a war. I do not like the war. I think it started because the U.S. wanted to punish Iraq for the attacks on September 11.  I do not think it is fair to stay in Iraq. Staying there is like trying to make Iraq like the United States. This will take a long time and it may not work.  

If the U.S. leaves, Iraq may be angry. People in Iraq need help, but the U.S. is spending too much money there. The war makes President Bush look bad. Some people say he is like the president who started the Vietnam War. That war was not a good thing. 

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. They want the war to end. But it is hard to say that. Iraq is a very different place than the United States. Staying there may make people in Iraq even more angry. 

The war will probably go on for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make it legal for a state to say it is legal. I think it is up to the churches. The Constitution says that there is a separation of church and state. This is clear. I think trying to change this is wrong. It goes against what is already in the Constitution.

People who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's beliefs over others. Many Catholics and Christians are against it. I do not think the government should say what churches can and cannot do.

The separation of church and state is important for religious freedom in the United States. Even though there was a plan for an amendment, I think making an amendment is wrong. It goes against the Constitution. This amendment would be used to restrict people, not the government. 

I do not think the federal government should be involved in this issue. The person pushing for this amendment is doing it because of his own beliefs. He is showing that he favors one religion over others. I think it is up to the churches to decide. 

The government should not get involved. I do not see why this amendment is needed. It will not help the economy. It might even be good for society.

The war in Iraq is hard. The government did not tell the people the full truth about why we went to war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th, but that is not true. The government made people afraid and used that fear to start the war in 2003.

I do not like war. I do not like fighting first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should have learned from mistakes in the past. Many soldiers died in Iraq, and that is very sad.

We took away the Iraqi government. The government was not ready for what came next. There was no plan for what to do after the war. There was a lot of fighting and chaos.

We tried to make Iraq a democracy, just like we tried to do in Vietnam. We wanted to stop communism in Vietnam and make a democracy. But it was hard. It takes a long time to build a new government.

It was a big mistake to go to war in Iraq. We should have planned better. We should have thought about all the problems that could happen. We are still there, and many soldiers are still dying. It is a long and hard fight.

The government said the war would be quick and easy. But it is not. It takes a long time to build a new government.

It is hard to leave Iraq now. We made a mess, and we cannot just walk away. But we also cannot keep sending soldiers to die.

Why did we go to war in Iraq? Why not in other countries? Some people say it is because of the oil.

We said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but we never found them.

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there is peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. I think it is a personal choice. It is good for people. Some studies show that being gay is natural, not a choice. It is not fair to give people less rights because of something they cannot control. I think it is wrong to do this.

I have always been a supporter of gay marriage. I do not think the government should have a say in this. It is a personal matter, a family matter.

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs and go about their lives. They cannot get married, but they are happy.

I think it is wrong for the government to tell people who they can marry. It is not the government's place.

I have read that being gay may be caused by things in the brain. It may be something people are born with. This is different from things like growing up with many sisters.

The only reason marriage is a big deal for gay people is because they are not allowed to marry. A man and a woman can marry easily. They do not need to tell anyone.

Marriage should be a private matter, not something the government controls.

The net is public. When you put things on the net, every one can see them. You must think before you write. If you write bad things, people will see them.

Schools must keep students safe. If a student says bad things on the net, the school must act. They can not let bad things happen.

It is hard to know what is a joke and what is serious. Some people say things to get attention. Some people mean what they say. Schools must be careful.

One time, a student said bad things on the net. Someone saw it and told the school. The school looked at the student's net pages. They found things that were very bad.

The student said he was joking, but the school did not know. They had to be careful.

When you put things on the net, remember that everyone can see them. Think before you write.

The war has gone on for too long. At first, the goal was good. We wanted to help a country have more democracy. But now, I think we have forgotten the reason.

Maybe we want to show we are powerful. Maybe the reason started bad. It might have been about the problems between the president’s father and Saddam Hussein.

I think if we wanted to help the people have a fair government, that would be good. But if there were other reasons, that would be bad. 

The war showed we were strong at the start. But it has been going on for too long. 

I think we should have stopped after the first few months.

Maybe our reason for fighting has changed. Now it seems like we want to win, no matter what. We need to end the war, one way or another.

We spend a lot of money on the war. We have problems at home, like poor people and bad roads. We should use that money to help people here.

The war hurts our money. We should spend it on things like schools, health care, and helping poor people. We should not spend our money on war forever.

We have lost the reason to fight. We need to stop. The people in that country need to fight for themselves.

My friend and I talk about Myspace. Myspace is a place on the internet. People put information about themself on Myspace.

My friend thinks it is good if a person sees bad things on Myspace and can stop them. But it is hard to look at all the profiles.

My friend thinks it is not right to pick on people.  

My friend does not like that people can see things about her on Facebook. She does not want people to know too much.

My friend thinks it is strange that her roommate's high school told them not to use Myspace. She thinks the school does not have the right to do that.

The Iraq War was bad. Many people think this. It has been bad from the start. Most people in Iraq, the United States, and the world think it was a bad idea. Many American soldiers in Iraq also think this.  


The war is hard. The United States and Middle Eastern countries are very different.


The United States tried to bring democracy to Iraq. This was a bad idea.


Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. But the United States did not think about the problems of going to war.


Almost everyone thinks we should leave Iraq.


The United States should leave Iraq soon. This will be hard, but it is the best choice.


Leaving now will be better than staying.

I think gender is still a problem in the United States. 

It is not just women. It is about the kind of work you do.

Women face more problems. There is a glass ceiling. Even when there is supposed to be equality, some people have a hard time working for a woman.

Society has taught us this. Women may be ready for a job, but the people who choose who gets promoted may not want to see a woman in a high position.

This is true for men too. Think of things like fashion.

It is rare to see a man stay home to raise children. People think men should work and be the money maker. If a man wants to stay home, people may not like it.

In fashion, men may not be taken seriously if they are straight. People think fashion is for women.

Many jobs have these problems. I think we have made progress, but it is slow.

Women are becoming CEOs. Men are staying home with children. These things are becoming more normal.

It takes time for people to change their minds. We need to show the good qualities of people who are often judged.

People say that marijuana is no longer a crime. It is now a small problem, like a traffic ticket. People get a ticket instead of going to jail. This is good because it is very expensive to arrest, hold, and try people in court.  

Some areas want to save money, so they make marijuana a small problem. Denver is different. People there like the idea. They think the money saved can help schools, old people, and homeless people.

Some people think marijuana should not be easy to get. It is still bad to smoke it in some places. It is hard to say what would happen if marijuana was legal like cigarettes. 

Alcohol is bad for driving, but marijuana can make people’s lives worse.  People react to drugs in different ways. Some people can use things like alcohol and marijuana without problems, but others have more trouble.

I think yes. 

Many Catholic things are old. They do the same things for a long time. It is good to keep old ways. But it is also good to change.

Many Catholics go to church every week. They follow rules. Sometimes, I feel the church looks down on people who do not follow all the rules. They do not like people who are not perfect Catholics. They do not like people of other religions.

My dad was not Catholic. He was Episcopalian. My mom was Catholic. The church would not let them marry because of my dad’s religion.

This is not loving others.  Catholics learn to love others. It is wrong to say love others and not accept them. 

Catholic rules say to do good things. But how Catholics act is not always good. The rules are old. They do not change.

I think it is good if priests can marry. But this will not stop bad priests. They are bad because of who they are, not because they are not married.

Bad people hurt children. They hurt children even if they are married.

This is a hard question. I am not sure what is right or wrong. But it is a very hard problem. It is about church and state. It is also about how to say what marriage is. This is hard because it can hurt people's feelings.

I think all unions should be the same. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government. If marriage is a religious thing, the government should not care. People do not get tax breaks or special treatment from the government because they are baptized.

If two people are married, the government should see it as a civil union. It is just two people together. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

If all states agree on what to do, they should make it a law for the whole country. But changing the Constitution to ban gay marriage is wrong. The Constitution should not be changed for this. It is important to some people, but not important enough to change the Constitution.

I grew up in a Christian family. Homosexuality is hard for me to understand. I have gay friends. I do not like that way of life. But I think it should be legal. It should not be a big problem for the country. Each state should decide. 

Some states like the Democratic Party. Some like the Republican Party. Democratic states want to allow gay marriage. If you live in a Democratic state, you should accept that state's decision.

I think gay people should have the same chances as other people. I think it should be legal in each state.

I do not think the president should decide for the whole country. The president does not live in every state. He should not tell states what to do. 

Bush will leave office soon. If a Democratic president comes next, he may change the law. It is better if each state decides. They are the ones who will live with the decision.

Myspace is for the public. If you post on Myspace, people can see it. This includes school officials. If the school wants to check on students, they can look at Myspace. This is not a crime. 

School officials have a job to keep students safe. If they see something on Myspace that shows a danger to students, they have the right to look at it. 

It is good to be careful about what you post online. Things on the internet can stay there forever. If you post something bad, it can hurt you later.

I think it is okay for school officials to look at Myspace if they think it will help keep students safe.

The war was hard. I was sad after nine eleven. I wanted to fight back. I think we rushed into the war. We did not have a good plan. I think it did not help.

Now I am against the war. I think the people there are fighting each other. They cannot fight us if they are fighting each other.

I do not care what happens to them. They fight too much. They cannot help themselves.

We did not know what we were doing. War is different there. They are very strong in war. They want us to leave. I think we should leave.

We went to war because we were angry. I think President Bush wanted to fight. I think he did not have a good plan.

I do not think we could do nothing. They did a bad thing. But we should have a better plan.

We did not know what to do. We were not together. We did not know why we were there.

The Catholic Church must change some of its views. Many people are leaving the Church. This is because the Church is not accepting of some things. For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These views are old. The Church should think about new ideas. Then, it will not lose followers.

People disagree with the Church on these subjects. Some people think the Church is wrong. The Church is against abortion. If you want an abortion, you may not feel welcome in the Church.

The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you may not feel welcome in the Church. I think women can be priests. I think priests can be married. 

The Church says priests are married to God. But people have jobs and families. Priests can have both.

I support gay marriage. I think people are born this way. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are. It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can marry, but two people of the same sex cannot. I think the government should not tell people who they can love. It is a personal matter.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason to say no to it. Some people think that gay couples are bad for families. But that is not true. Gay couples are different, but that is okay. 

It is like two sides of the same coin. They are different, but they are still the same thing. Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. This includes things like taxes and health care.

If you are sick, your partner should be able to be with you. They should not be left out just because they are not married.

Many studies show that gay couples are happy. They have the same things in a relationship as straight couples do.

Gay couples are not asking to get married in a church. They just want a paper from the government.

The government should not mix with religion. If the government lets people have civil unions, they should let them have marriage too.

It is like segregation. It is not fair to treat people differently just because they are gay.

Gay couples can have children and be good parents. They can teach their children the same things as straight couples do.

Some people are afraid of how children of gay couples will be treated. But children should not be treated differently just because their parents are gay. They should be allowed to go to any school and be happy.

The government should help gay couples. It should make gay marriage legal in every state.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many medicines. Some medicines are good. Some medicines are bad. The law says some medicines are bad. This does not mean they are not good. Some bad medicines are good for sickness.

For example, many pharmacies use medicines like oxycotton, Vicodin, and Percocet. These medicines are strong. But they help people. We use them to help people feel better.

Marijuana is a bad medicine. The law says it is bad. But it can also help people feel better.  It can help with pain. It can help with sickness.

Some people say marijuana is like alcohol. Alcohol is bad if you use too much. Marijuana can be bad too. But marijuana is not as bad as alcohol.

I think people should use marijuana carefully. It should be legal for doctors to use.

People think marijuana is bad. This is because it is illegal. But it is not as bad as other bad medicines. If people use it carefully, it can be good.

The church has changed some. It is not as strict now as before. I went to church every Sunday when I was young. I would wear pretty dresses, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school and saw my friends at church on the weekends. Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually now, even in the summer. They come in their beach clothes. Families are late sometimes. Morning mass used to be very formal. Now people wear jeans and khakis.

I think the biggest change is how people dress. That is the main thing I have noticed. 

I do not know much about the problems the church has had. I do not know about politics in the church.

I do not think allowing women to be priests or letting priests marry would have stopped the bad things that happened. Some married men are bad people too. It is the person, not their marriage.  Some religions allow priests to marry. If people want to practice their faith and be married, they could try a different religion.

The Iraq War is bad. The Bush people said bad things about Iraq. They said Iraq had bad weapons. They said Iraq was bad for America. This is not true.

The Bush people lied to the people. They said Iraq was bad. They said Iraq was with people who did bad things on September 11th. This is not true.

Colin Powell said things to the United Nations. He said Iraq was bad. Now he says he did not think Iraq was bad. This is bad.

The Bush people did not care about the rules of the country. They wanted to go to war. They did not like Iraq. They wanted to take Iraq's oil.

The Iraq War is not good. Many people died.

We need to leave Iraq. But leaving is hard. Iraq may have a bad war.

Other countries can help. But this may be bad too. Iraq wants to be its own country.

The government in Iraq is not good. They cannot make good choices. Bad people are fighting for power.

The Iraq War is bad news.

The war in Iraq is hard to talk about. It is not a real war because Congress did not say it was a war. I do not like the war. I think it started because the U.S. wanted to punish Iraq for the attacks on September 11.  I do not think it is fair to stay in Iraq. Staying there is like trying to make Iraq like the United States. This will take a long time and it may not work.  

If the U.S. leaves, Iraq may be angry. People in Iraq need help, but the U.S. is spending too much money there. The war makes President Bush look bad. Some people say he is like the president who started the Vietnam War. That war was not a good thing. 

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. They want the war to end. But it is hard to say that. Iraq is a very different place than the United States. Staying there may make people in Iraq even more angry. 

The war will probably go on for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make it legal for a state to say it is legal. I think it is up to the churches. The Constitution says that there is a separation of church and state. This is clear. I think trying to change this is wrong. It goes against what is already in the Constitution.

People who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's beliefs over others. Many Catholics and Christians are against it. I do not think the government should say what churches can and cannot do.

The separation of church and state is important for religious freedom in the United States. Even though there was a plan for an amendment, I think making an amendment is wrong. It goes against the Constitution. This amendment would be used to restrict people, not the government. 

I do not think the federal government should be involved in this issue. The person pushing for this amendment is doing it because of his own beliefs. He is showing that he favors one religion over others. I think it is up to the churches to decide. 

The government should not get involved. I do not see why this amendment is needed. It will not help the economy. It might even be good for society.

The war in Iraq is hard. The government did not tell the people the full truth about why we went to war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th, but that is not true. The government made people afraid and used that fear to start the war in 2003.

I do not like war. I do not like fighting first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should have learned from mistakes in the past. Many soldiers died in Iraq, and that is very sad.

We took away the Iraqi government. The government was not ready for what came next. There was no plan for what to do after the war. There was a lot of fighting and chaos.

We tried to make Iraq a democracy, just like we tried to do in Vietnam. We wanted to stop communism in Vietnam and make a democracy. But it was hard. It takes a long time to build a new government.

It was a big mistake to go to war in Iraq. We should have planned better. We should have thought about all the problems that could happen. We are still there, and many soldiers are still dying. It is a long and hard fight.

The government said the war would be quick and easy. But it is not. It takes a long time to build a new government.

It is hard to leave Iraq now. We made a mess, and we cannot just walk away. But we also cannot keep sending soldiers to die.

Why did we go to war in Iraq? Why not in other countries? Some people say it is because of the oil.

We said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but we never found them.

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there is peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. I think it is a personal choice. It is good for people. Some studies show that being gay is natural, not a choice. It is not fair to give people less rights because of something they cannot control. I think it is wrong to do this.

I have always been a supporter of gay marriage. I do not think the government should have a say in this. It is a personal matter, a family matter.

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs and go about their lives. They cannot get married, but they are happy.

I think it is wrong for the government to tell people who they can marry. It is not the government's place.

I have read that being gay may be caused by things in the brain. It may be something people are born with. This is different from things like growing up with many sisters.

The only reason marriage is a big deal for gay people is because they are not allowed to marry. A man and a woman can marry easily. They do not need to tell anyone.

Marriage should be a private matter, not something the government controls.

The net is public. When you put things on the net, every one can see them. You must think before you write. If you write bad things, people will see them.

Schools must keep students safe. If a student says bad things on the net, the school must act. They can not let bad things happen.

It is hard to know what is a joke and what is serious. Some people say things to get attention. Some people mean what they say. Schools must be careful.

One time, a student said bad things on the net. Someone saw it and told the school. The school looked at the student's net pages. They found things that were very bad.

The student said he was joking, but the school did not know. They had to be careful.

When you put things on the net, remember that everyone can see them. Think before you write.

The war has gone on for too long. At first, the goal was good. We wanted to help a country have more democracy. But now, I think we have forgotten the reason.

Maybe we want to show we are powerful. Maybe the reason started bad. It might have been about the problems between the president’s father and Saddam Hussein.

I think if we wanted to help the people have a fair government, that would be good. But if there were other reasons, that would be bad. 

The war showed we were strong at the start. But it has been going on for too long. 

I think we should have stopped after the first few months.

Maybe our reason for fighting has changed. Now it seems like we want to win, no matter what. We need to end the war, one way or another.

We spend a lot of money on the war. We have problems at home, like poor people and bad roads. We should use that money to help people here.

The war hurts our money. We should spend it on things like schools, health care, and helping poor people. We should not spend our money on war forever.

We have lost the reason to fight. We need to stop. The people in that country need to fight for themselves.

My friend and I talk about Myspace. Myspace is a place on the internet. People put information about themself on Myspace.

My friend thinks it is good if a person sees bad things on Myspace and can stop them. But it is hard to look at all the profiles.

My friend thinks it is not right to pick on people.  

My friend does not like that people can see things about her on Facebook. She does not want people to know too much.

My friend thinks it is strange that her roommate's high school told them not to use Myspace. She thinks the school does not have the right to do that.

The Iraq War was bad. Many people think this. It has been bad from the start. Most people in Iraq, the United States, and the world think it was a bad idea. Many American soldiers in Iraq also think this.  


The war is hard. The United States and Middle Eastern countries are very different.


The United States tried to bring democracy to Iraq. This was a bad idea.


Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. But the United States did not think about the problems of going to war.


Almost everyone thinks we should leave Iraq.


The United States should leave Iraq soon. This will be hard, but it is the best choice.


Leaving now will be better than staying.

I think gender is still a problem in the United States. 

It is not just women. It is about the kind of work you do.

Women face more problems. There is a glass ceiling. Even when there is supposed to be equality, some people have a hard time working for a woman.

Society has taught us this. Women may be ready for a job, but the people who choose who gets promoted may not want to see a woman in a high position.

This is true for men too. Think of things like fashion.

It is rare to see a man stay home to raise children. People think men should work and be the money maker. If a man wants to stay home, people may not like it.

In fashion, men may not be taken seriously if they are straight. People think fashion is for women.

Many jobs have these problems. I think we have made progress, but it is slow.

Women are becoming CEOs. Men are staying home with children. These things are becoming more normal.

It takes time for people to change their minds. We need to show the good qualities of people who are often judged.

People say that marijuana is no longer a crime. It is now a small problem, like a traffic ticket. People get a ticket instead of going to jail. This is good because it is very expensive to arrest, hold, and try people in court.  

Some areas want to save money, so they make marijuana a small problem. Denver is different. People there like the idea. They think the money saved can help schools, old people, and homeless people.

Some people think marijuana should not be easy to get. It is still bad to smoke it in some places. It is hard to say what would happen if marijuana was legal like cigarettes. 

Alcohol is bad for driving, but marijuana can make people’s lives worse.  People react to drugs in different ways. Some people can use things like alcohol and marijuana without problems, but others have more trouble.

I think yes. 

Many Catholic things are old. They do the same things for a long time. It is good to keep old ways. But it is also good to change.

Many Catholics go to church every week. They follow rules. Sometimes, I feel the church looks down on people who do not follow all the rules. They do not like people who are not perfect Catholics. They do not like people of other religions.

My dad was not Catholic. He was Episcopalian. My mom was Catholic. The church would not let them marry because of my dad’s religion.

This is not loving others.  Catholics learn to love others. It is wrong to say love others and not accept them. 

Catholic rules say to do good things. But how Catholics act is not always good. The rules are old. They do not change.

I think it is good if priests can marry. But this will not stop bad priests. They are bad because of who they are, not because they are not married.

Bad people hurt children. They hurt children even if they are married.

This is a hard question. I am not sure what is right or wrong. But it is a very hard problem. It is about church and state. It is also about how to say what marriage is. This is hard because it can hurt people's feelings.

I think all unions should be the same. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government. If marriage is a religious thing, the government should not care. People do not get tax breaks or special treatment from the government because they are baptized.

If two people are married, the government should see it as a civil union. It is just two people together. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

If all states agree on what to do, they should make it a law for the whole country. But changing the Constitution to ban gay marriage is wrong. The Constitution should not be changed for this. It is important to some people, but not important enough to change the Constitution.

I grew up in a Christian family. Homosexuality is hard for me to understand. I have gay friends. I do not like that way of life. But I think it should be legal. It should not be a big problem for the country. Each state should decide. 

Some states like the Democratic Party. Some like the Republican Party. Democratic states want to allow gay marriage. If you live in a Democratic state, you should accept that state's decision.

I think gay people should have the same chances as other people. I think it should be legal in each state.

I do not think the president should decide for the whole country. The president does not live in every state. He should not tell states what to do. 

Bush will leave office soon. If a Democratic president comes next, he may change the law. It is better if each state decides. They are the ones who will live with the decision.

Myspace is for the public. If you post on Myspace, people can see it. This includes school officials. If the school wants to check on students, they can look at Myspace. This is not a crime. 

School officials have a job to keep students safe. If they see something on Myspace that shows a danger to students, they have the right to look at it. 

It is good to be careful about what you post online. Things on the internet can stay there forever. If you post something bad, it can hurt you later.

I think it is okay for school officials to look at Myspace if they think it will help keep students safe.

The war was hard. I was sad after nine eleven. I wanted to fight back. I think we rushed into the war. We did not have a good plan. I think it did not help.

Now I am against the war. I think the people there are fighting each other. They cannot fight us if they are fighting each other.

I do not care what happens to them. They fight too much. They cannot help themselves.

We did not know what we were doing. War is different there. They are very strong in war. They want us to leave. I think we should leave.

We went to war because we were angry. I think President Bush wanted to fight. I think he did not have a good plan.

I do not think we could do nothing. They did a bad thing. But we should have a better plan.

We did not know what to do. We were not together. We did not know why we were there.
