transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs to change some things. Many people are leaving the Church. They think the Church is not accepting of many things. For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. 

The Church's views are old. They need to think in new ways. If they do, they will not lose people. Many people disagree with the Church on these things. They feel the Church is wrong. If a person believes in abortion, they may not want to be in the Church. If a person believes in gay marriage, they may not want to be in the Church.

The Church says priests are married to God. They give their lives to God. But everyone else has a job and a family. Why can't priests have both?

I think gay marriage is good. People should not be sad if they are gay.  They are born this way.

I think it is wrong to say that only men and women can marry. Gay men and women should have the same right.

People are born different. Some are born straight. Some are born gay. It is not a choice.

The government should not say what people can do in love. It is a personal thing.

I think gay marriage good.

Many people say gay couples bad for family. But it is different.

Gay couples have same rights as other couples.

If gay couples can not see sick partner, that is not fair.

Study show gay couples happy like other couples.

Gay couples want marriage paper from the government, not church.

Church and government should be separate.

Some say gay marriage bad for children.

But gay children same as other children.

Government should help gay couples.

Gay marriage is legal in all states.

President Bush say no to gay marriage.

He say it bad for morals.

Morals are different for each person.

Government should not make law based on one group's beliefs.

Some people say gay people sick. But this not true.

People should listen to experts, not just friends or church.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many medicines. Some medicines are good. Some medicines are bad. Some medicines are against the law.  

Just because a medicine is against the law does not mean it is not good.

Some medicines are good for helping people. These medicines are called "controlled substances."

We use these medicines in the pharmacy. We use them to help people.

Marijuana is against the law. But it can also be good for some people.

If we use marijuana to help people, it can be good.

Alcohol is also bad if you use too much. But it is legal.

Marijuana should be legal if it can help people.

We should not be afraid of marijuana. It is not as bad as some other drugs.

If people know marijuana can help, they will use it more carefully.

The church has become more modern. It is not as strict as it used to be.

When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I would wear a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends every Sunday. We would go to church together.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is shorter, and people dress more casually. In summer, some people come in their beach clothes. 

Even at the morning mass, where I used to dress up, people now wear jeans and khakis. 

The biggest change is how people dress.

I do not know much about the politics of the church.

I think the pedophilia problem could not be prevented by allowing women priests or married priests. Some men who are married become pedophiles.

I think it is a choice to become a priest. There are other religions where priests can be married. If someone wants to practice their faith and be married, they should consider another religion.

The Iraq War is hard. It make me angry.

After September 11th, the Bush team said Iraq was bad. They said Iraq had bad things and was with the bad people who did September 11th. They lied.

I feel the Bush team lied to people. Even Colin Powell said he did not know if the bad things about Iraq were true. I think this is wrong. It is wrong to lie to people.

The Bush team does not care about the rules of the country. They want to be very strong.

The Bush team wanted to go to war. They may have wanted oil from Iraq. That is not right.

I think the war is too long. If we leave now, there may be more fighting.

The United Nations wants to help Iraq. They want other countries to help, like Syria and Saudi Arabia. But I do not know if this is good.

Iraq should be its own country. But the government is weak. The leader of Iraq does not have much power.

There are many groups in Iraq. They want power. They fight with each other. This is bad.

The war in Iraq is hard to talk about. I do not know much about it. It began after the big attacks on America in nine eleven. I think many people felt angry and wanted to get back at Iraq. 

I do not like war. I do not think it is fair. We should not call it a war if Congress did not say it was a war. We should not use guns to show we are big and strong.

I think we should help Iraq, but staying there is hard. It is like we are trying to make them like us. It may not work. We should not try to force our beliefs on them.

Many families have children in Iraq. I feel bad for them. But I also worry that staying too long will make things worse. Iraq is a different place with a different way of life.

I think the war will go on for a long time. It is a sad situation.

The writer does not think the government should make laws about what churches can do. The writer says the constitution says the government and church should be separate.  The writer thinks it is wrong to make a law to say what is good or bad for churches.

The writer thinks it is wrong to make a law about this. The writer says it would be the only law that stops people from doing things instead of stopping the government. The writer thinks the government should not tell churches what to do.

The writer says the government should not be involved in this issue. The writer thinks the president is doing this because he does not like this. The writer thinks it is unfair to make a law because of one person's beliefs. The writer thinks churches should make this decision, not the government.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the real reasons for the war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th, but these things were not really connected. The government made people afraid after September 11th and used this to start the war.

I am against war, especially when a country attacks first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should have learned from the mistakes they made in Vietnam. Many American soldiers died in Iraq.

The government took away the Iraqi government and did not plan for what would happen next. This created chaos.

The United States tried to make Iraq a democracy, like they tried to do in Vietnam. This is a hard thing to do.

The government did not plan for the long war in Iraq. They did not think it would be hard to make Iraq a democracy. They made it seem easy.

The war in Iraq is hard. We are still there. Many American soldiers are still there, and many have died. The United States is trying to teach Iraqis to control their own country, but this takes a long time. 

It is hard to know what to do. We cannot just leave Iraq, because we took away their government. But we cannot keep fighting forever. How many more soldiers must die?

Maybe the war is about oil. The United States wants to control Iraq's oil. 

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but they were not found. Other countries have weapons of mass destruction, but the United States is not attacking them.

I hope the war ends soon and there is peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a personal choice. Some say it is in our genes, not just how we grow up. To give people less rights because of this is not fair. It is not right.

I think politics should not decide. This is a personal matter. It is between people and their families.

In my town, there are gay couples who live like other families. They walk their dogs, they are good neighbors.

I think it is wrong for the government to say who can marry. Marriage is for people to decide, not the government.

Some say being gay is in our genes, not a choice. This is like saying we choose our height or our hair color.

It is unfair that a gay couple cannot marry, but a straight couple can.

Marriage is a personal thing. People should be able to decide for themselves who to marry.

The internet is public.  When you put things on the internet, people can see them.

If you write about bad things, like hurting people, someone will tell the school. The school must act. They must keep students safe. 

It is hard to know if something on the internet is a joke or serious. Sometimes, people make harmless things that seem bad. Other times, people mean to hurt others.

The school may look at things on the internet if someone tells them about something bad.

You can’t control what people think. If you post something on the internet, people may think poorly of you.

It is not right for teachers to pretend to be students on the internet.

If you don’t want people to see something, don’t put it on the internet.

The war is long. I think it started with good reason. The goal was to help a country have democracy. But now, I think we do not have that goal. Maybe we are just fighting to show we are strong.

I also think the reasons we started the war may have been wrong. George Bush’s father had problems with Saddam Hussein before. This may have made us start the war.

If we wanted to give democracy to a country without one, that would be good. But if we had other reasons, that is not fair.

The war has gone on for many years. I think we showed our power at the start. But now it is too long.

If we wanted to help people who had a bad leader, that is a good reason to fight. But now our reasons are not clear. We seem to be fighting just to fight.

The war is too long. It should stop. The people in that country must take care of themselves.

We waste money on the war. We have problems here at home, like poverty. We should use the money to help people here.

We spend a lot of money on war. This money could be used for better things, like schools, roads, and health care. We have problems in our own country. We should spend money on those.

We are sending our people to die in a war that we do not have a good reason for.

My friend said her high school stopped students from using Myspace.  I thought that was strange. I do not know if that is a good idea. I do not know if the school has the right to say what the students can do on the internet.

I think people should be careful about what they put on the internet. Many people can see it. If you put things on Myspace, many people can see it. You should think about this before you post.  

If you are worried about people seeing your Myspace, you should not post much. I do not have a Myspace, but I have a Facebook. I worry about people who might see bad things on my Facebook.

The Iraq War was a bad idea. Many people think this. Polls show most people in the world think it was a bad idea. Most Iraqis think we should leave. Many U.S. soldiers think this too. The war has been bad from the start. Leaving will also be hard. It is difficult to solve problems in the Middle East. 

The United States and Middle Eastern countries have different ways of life. The United States government thought it could bring democracy to Iraq. But this is not the way Iraqis want to live.

Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. But we should think about the good and bad before we go to war with a country. The war in Iraq has been bad. It is like quicksand. We should leave Iraq.

The Iraqi people want us to leave. They know what is best for their country. If we leave, it will be their choice. If things go bad, we can say we tried to help but they chose to leave. 

We may never be seen as good guys in the Middle East. But leaving would be better than staying.

Yes, I think there is still problem with how people treat men and women differently in the United States. 

It is not just a problem for women. I think it depends on the kind of work a person does. 

Women may have more problems. There is a thing called the "glass ceiling." Even with equality, it is hard for women to get to the top jobs.

Sometimes, a board of people will not pick a woman for a job even if she is very good. This is because people think that women should not be in charge. 

Men can have problems too. For example, if a man wants to stay home to take care of his children, people sometimes think it is strange.

In the fashion world, men may not be taken seriously. People may think that men do not know much about fashion.


It is hard to change these things because people have strong ideas about how men and women should be. We have come a long way, but change is slow. 

More women are getting high jobs and more men are staying home with their children. People are starting to accept these things more.

To make things better, we must show the good qualities of people who are different. We must not push too hard, but show that they are good at their jobs. 

Change takes time. We have come a long way. We need to keep working to make things better.

Drug laws are changing.

Some places have made a change called decriminalization. This means a drug is no longer a crime. It is like a traffic ticket.

A person caught with the drug will not be arrested. They may be given a fine.

There are good and bad parts to this change.

Some people say it saves money. It costs money to arrest, hold, and try people in court. 

Decriminalization saves money for the government.

Other people say there are bad things about it. Some jobs will not hire people with drug charges. This can make it hard to find a job.

Denver is a city that decriminalized marijuana. They say they have more money now for schools and helping people.

Some people think marijuana should be legal like alcohol. Others think it should not be sold everywhere.

Everyone reacts to drugs differently. Some people are careful. Other people use drugs too much.

Marijuana and alcohol both have bad effects.

It is hard to say if decriminalization is good or bad.

I say yes.

Many things the church does are old. They do them for long time. It is good to be old. But it is good to change also. Many Catholics go to church each week. They are strict about how things are done.

Sometimes I think the church looks down on people who are not perfect. They do not accept people who are not Catholic. They do not accept people of other religions. For example, my dad was not Catholic. My mom was Catholic. They would not marry them in the church. This is not loving. The church teaches to love others. But they do not accept others like this.

The church tells you to do things. But the church does not do them. The rules are old. They stay old. I think priests should be able to marry. But this would not stop bad things. Bad things happen for many reasons.

Some people hurt children. They do this no matter if they are married or not. Allowing priests to marry will not stop this.

This is a hard question for me. I do not have all the answers. I do not think one side is right or wrong. This is a very hard issue. It is about the church and the state. It is also about what marriage is. This is hard because we must be kind to everyone. 

I think all unions should be equal. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government. Marriage is special to some people. People do not get tax breaks or special treatment from the government just because they are baptized.

If two people are married, the government should see it as a civil union. That is what it is: two people together. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is. 

If all the states agree on a law, then it should be a law for the whole country. But changing the constitution to ban gay marriage is not right. The constitution should not be changed for this. It is important to some people, but not important enough to change the constitution.

It is not right to change the constitution to ban gay marriage.

I grew up in a home where people practice Christianity. So, my view on homosexuality is not easy. I have friends who are gay. I do not agree with their way of life. But I think it is right for them to marry. I do not think the whole country should decide on this. I think each state should decide.

Some states have many people who vote for the Democratic party. Some states have many people who vote for the Republican party. Democratic states want to allow gay marriage. If you live in a Democratic state, you know how they feel. You chose to live there. I do not think you can disagree with their choice.

I think gay people should have the same chances as straight people. I think they should be able to marry. Each state should decide this, not the president.

The president should not tell every state what to do. He does not live in every state. I think some things are better left to each state. The president will leave office soon. If a new president wants to allow gay marriage, it will be back and forth. It is better for each state to decide. They are the ones who will have to live with the choice.

Myspace is for people to see. If you put something on Myspace, others can see it. School officials have the right to see this. They want to make sure the school is safe. 

If the school can stop a shooting, that is good. School officials have a duty to keep students safe.

If they look at Myspace to find out if students are doing bad things, that is different. That is not right. But if they are trying to keep students safe, that is okay.

School officials should not look at Myspace just to get students in trouble. But if they see something that could help keep the school safe, then that is okay.

People should be careful about what they put on the internet. Things can come back to hurt you. 

School shootings are bad. Schools try to stop them. They do drills to practice staying safe. 

School officials are trying to keep the school safe.

The war is hard. After nine eleven, I want to fight. I want to make them hurt like they hurt us. But now I think we made a big mistake. We went to war without a plan. We did not know what to do.

The people there always fight with each other. They cannot be our friends. We cannot help them. War is different for them. They are wild. They want us to leave.

We should leave. We went there for revenge. The people wanted it. The president made the war. We had to do something after nine eleven. We could not let them get away with it.

We did not know what to do after the war. We did not have a plan. We did not have a goal. We were angry. We made things worse.

We cannot change them. They are always going to be like this. We should leave. Staying there does not help. It hurts us.

The Catholic Church needs to change some things. Many people are leaving the Church. They think the Church is not accepting of many things. For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. 

The Church's views are old. They need to think in new ways. If they do, they will not lose people. Many people disagree with the Church on these things. They feel the Church is wrong. If a person believes in abortion, they may not want to be in the Church. If a person believes in gay marriage, they may not want to be in the Church.

The Church says priests are married to God. They give their lives to God. But everyone else has a job and a family. Why can't priests have both?

I think gay marriage is good. People should not be sad if they are gay.  They are born this way.

I think it is wrong to say that only men and women can marry. Gay men and women should have the same right.

People are born different. Some are born straight. Some are born gay. It is not a choice.

The government should not say what people can do in love. It is a personal thing.

I think gay marriage good.

Many people say gay couples bad for family. But it is different.

Gay couples have same rights as other couples.

If gay couples can not see sick partner, that is not fair.

Study show gay couples happy like other couples.

Gay couples want marriage paper from the government, not church.

Church and government should be separate.

Some say gay marriage bad for children.

But gay children same as other children.

Government should help gay couples.

Gay marriage is legal in all states.

President Bush say no to gay marriage.

He say it bad for morals.

Morals are different for each person.

Government should not make law based on one group's beliefs.

Some people say gay people sick. But this not true.

People should listen to experts, not just friends or church.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many medicines. Some medicines are good. Some medicines are bad. Some medicines are against the law.  

Just because a medicine is against the law does not mean it is not good.

Some medicines are good for helping people. These medicines are called "controlled substances."

We use these medicines in the pharmacy. We use them to help people.

Marijuana is against the law. But it can also be good for some people.

If we use marijuana to help people, it can be good.

Alcohol is also bad if you use too much. But it is legal.

Marijuana should be legal if it can help people.

We should not be afraid of marijuana. It is not as bad as some other drugs.

If people know marijuana can help, they will use it more carefully.

The church has become more modern. It is not as strict as it used to be.

When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I would wear a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends every Sunday. We would go to church together.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is shorter, and people dress more casually. In summer, some people come in their beach clothes. 

Even at the morning mass, where I used to dress up, people now wear jeans and khakis. 

The biggest change is how people dress.

I do not know much about the politics of the church.

I think the pedophilia problem could not be prevented by allowing women priests or married priests. Some men who are married become pedophiles.

I think it is a choice to become a priest. There are other religions where priests can be married. If someone wants to practice their faith and be married, they should consider another religion.

The Iraq War is hard. It make me angry.

After September 11th, the Bush team said Iraq was bad. They said Iraq had bad things and was with the bad people who did September 11th. They lied.

I feel the Bush team lied to people. Even Colin Powell said he did not know if the bad things about Iraq were true. I think this is wrong. It is wrong to lie to people.

The Bush team does not care about the rules of the country. They want to be very strong.

The Bush team wanted to go to war. They may have wanted oil from Iraq. That is not right.

I think the war is too long. If we leave now, there may be more fighting.

The United Nations wants to help Iraq. They want other countries to help, like Syria and Saudi Arabia. But I do not know if this is good.

Iraq should be its own country. But the government is weak. The leader of Iraq does not have much power.

There are many groups in Iraq. They want power. They fight with each other. This is bad.

The war in Iraq is hard to talk about. I do not know much about it. It began after the big attacks on America in nine eleven. I think many people felt angry and wanted to get back at Iraq. 

I do not like war. I do not think it is fair. We should not call it a war if Congress did not say it was a war. We should not use guns to show we are big and strong.

I think we should help Iraq, but staying there is hard. It is like we are trying to make them like us. It may not work. We should not try to force our beliefs on them.

Many families have children in Iraq. I feel bad for them. But I also worry that staying too long will make things worse. Iraq is a different place with a different way of life.

I think the war will go on for a long time. It is a sad situation.

The writer does not think the government should make laws about what churches can do. The writer says the constitution says the government and church should be separate.  The writer thinks it is wrong to make a law to say what is good or bad for churches.

The writer thinks it is wrong to make a law about this. The writer says it would be the only law that stops people from doing things instead of stopping the government. The writer thinks the government should not tell churches what to do.

The writer says the government should not be involved in this issue. The writer thinks the president is doing this because he does not like this. The writer thinks it is unfair to make a law because of one person's beliefs. The writer thinks churches should make this decision, not the government.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the real reasons for the war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th, but these things were not really connected. The government made people afraid after September 11th and used this to start the war.

I am against war, especially when a country attacks first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should have learned from the mistakes they made in Vietnam. Many American soldiers died in Iraq.

The government took away the Iraqi government and did not plan for what would happen next. This created chaos.

The United States tried to make Iraq a democracy, like they tried to do in Vietnam. This is a hard thing to do.

The government did not plan for the long war in Iraq. They did not think it would be hard to make Iraq a democracy. They made it seem easy.

The war in Iraq is hard. We are still there. Many American soldiers are still there, and many have died. The United States is trying to teach Iraqis to control their own country, but this takes a long time. 

It is hard to know what to do. We cannot just leave Iraq, because we took away their government. But we cannot keep fighting forever. How many more soldiers must die?

Maybe the war is about oil. The United States wants to control Iraq's oil. 

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but they were not found. Other countries have weapons of mass destruction, but the United States is not attacking them.

I hope the war ends soon and there is peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a personal choice. Some say it is in our genes, not just how we grow up. To give people less rights because of this is not fair. It is not right.

I think politics should not decide. This is a personal matter. It is between people and their families.

In my town, there are gay couples who live like other families. They walk their dogs, they are good neighbors.

I think it is wrong for the government to say who can marry. Marriage is for people to decide, not the government.

Some say being gay is in our genes, not a choice. This is like saying we choose our height or our hair color.

It is unfair that a gay couple cannot marry, but a straight couple can.

Marriage is a personal thing. People should be able to decide for themselves who to marry.

The internet is public.  When you put things on the internet, people can see them.

If you write about bad things, like hurting people, someone will tell the school. The school must act. They must keep students safe. 

It is hard to know if something on the internet is a joke or serious. Sometimes, people make harmless things that seem bad. Other times, people mean to hurt others.

The school may look at things on the internet if someone tells them about something bad.

You can’t control what people think. If you post something on the internet, people may think poorly of you.

It is not right for teachers to pretend to be students on the internet.

If you don’t want people to see something, don’t put it on the internet.

The war is long. I think it started with good reason. The goal was to help a country have democracy. But now, I think we do not have that goal. Maybe we are just fighting to show we are strong.

I also think the reasons we started the war may have been wrong. George Bush’s father had problems with Saddam Hussein before. This may have made us start the war.

If we wanted to give democracy to a country without one, that would be good. But if we had other reasons, that is not fair.

The war has gone on for many years. I think we showed our power at the start. But now it is too long.

If we wanted to help people who had a bad leader, that is a good reason to fight. But now our reasons are not clear. We seem to be fighting just to fight.

The war is too long. It should stop. The people in that country must take care of themselves.

We waste money on the war. We have problems here at home, like poverty. We should use the money to help people here.

We spend a lot of money on war. This money could be used for better things, like schools, roads, and health care. We have problems in our own country. We should spend money on those.

We are sending our people to die in a war that we do not have a good reason for.

My friend said her high school stopped students from using Myspace.  I thought that was strange. I do not know if that is a good idea. I do not know if the school has the right to say what the students can do on the internet.

I think people should be careful about what they put on the internet. Many people can see it. If you put things on Myspace, many people can see it. You should think about this before you post.  

If you are worried about people seeing your Myspace, you should not post much. I do not have a Myspace, but I have a Facebook. I worry about people who might see bad things on my Facebook.

The Iraq War was a bad idea. Many people think this. Polls show most people in the world think it was a bad idea. Most Iraqis think we should leave. Many U.S. soldiers think this too. The war has been bad from the start. Leaving will also be hard. It is difficult to solve problems in the Middle East. 

The United States and Middle Eastern countries have different ways of life. The United States government thought it could bring democracy to Iraq. But this is not the way Iraqis want to live.

Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. But we should think about the good and bad before we go to war with a country. The war in Iraq has been bad. It is like quicksand. We should leave Iraq.

The Iraqi people want us to leave. They know what is best for their country. If we leave, it will be their choice. If things go bad, we can say we tried to help but they chose to leave. 

We may never be seen as good guys in the Middle East. But leaving would be better than staying.

Yes, I think there is still problem with how people treat men and women differently in the United States. 

It is not just a problem for women. I think it depends on the kind of work a person does. 

Women may have more problems. There is a thing called the "glass ceiling." Even with equality, it is hard for women to get to the top jobs.

Sometimes, a board of people will not pick a woman for a job even if she is very good. This is because people think that women should not be in charge. 

Men can have problems too. For example, if a man wants to stay home to take care of his children, people sometimes think it is strange.

In the fashion world, men may not be taken seriously. People may think that men do not know much about fashion.


It is hard to change these things because people have strong ideas about how men and women should be. We have come a long way, but change is slow. 

More women are getting high jobs and more men are staying home with their children. People are starting to accept these things more.

To make things better, we must show the good qualities of people who are different. We must not push too hard, but show that they are good at their jobs. 

Change takes time. We have come a long way. We need to keep working to make things better.

Drug laws are changing.

Some places have made a change called decriminalization. This means a drug is no longer a crime. It is like a traffic ticket.

A person caught with the drug will not be arrested. They may be given a fine.

There are good and bad parts to this change.

Some people say it saves money. It costs money to arrest, hold, and try people in court. 

Decriminalization saves money for the government.

Other people say there are bad things about it. Some jobs will not hire people with drug charges. This can make it hard to find a job.

Denver is a city that decriminalized marijuana. They say they have more money now for schools and helping people.

Some people think marijuana should be legal like alcohol. Others think it should not be sold everywhere.

Everyone reacts to drugs differently. Some people are careful. Other people use drugs too much.

Marijuana and alcohol both have bad effects.

It is hard to say if decriminalization is good or bad.

I say yes.

Many things the church does are old. They do them for long time. It is good to be old. But it is good to change also. Many Catholics go to church each week. They are strict about how things are done.

Sometimes I think the church looks down on people who are not perfect. They do not accept people who are not Catholic. They do not accept people of other religions. For example, my dad was not Catholic. My mom was Catholic. They would not marry them in the church. This is not loving. The church teaches to love others. But they do not accept others like this.

The church tells you to do things. But the church does not do them. The rules are old. They stay old. I think priests should be able to marry. But this would not stop bad things. Bad things happen for many reasons.

Some people hurt children. They do this no matter if they are married or not. Allowing priests to marry will not stop this.

This is a hard question for me. I do not have all the answers. I do not think one side is right or wrong. This is a very hard issue. It is about the church and the state. It is also about what marriage is. This is hard because we must be kind to everyone. 

I think all unions should be equal. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government. Marriage is special to some people. People do not get tax breaks or special treatment from the government just because they are baptized.

If two people are married, the government should see it as a civil union. That is what it is: two people together. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is. 

If all the states agree on a law, then it should be a law for the whole country. But changing the constitution to ban gay marriage is not right. The constitution should not be changed for this. It is important to some people, but not important enough to change the constitution.

It is not right to change the constitution to ban gay marriage.

I grew up in a home where people practice Christianity. So, my view on homosexuality is not easy. I have friends who are gay. I do not agree with their way of life. But I think it is right for them to marry. I do not think the whole country should decide on this. I think each state should decide.

Some states have many people who vote for the Democratic party. Some states have many people who vote for the Republican party. Democratic states want to allow gay marriage. If you live in a Democratic state, you know how they feel. You chose to live there. I do not think you can disagree with their choice.

I think gay people should have the same chances as straight people. I think they should be able to marry. Each state should decide this, not the president.

The president should not tell every state what to do. He does not live in every state. I think some things are better left to each state. The president will leave office soon. If a new president wants to allow gay marriage, it will be back and forth. It is better for each state to decide. They are the ones who will have to live with the choice.

Myspace is for people to see. If you put something on Myspace, others can see it. School officials have the right to see this. They want to make sure the school is safe. 

If the school can stop a shooting, that is good. School officials have a duty to keep students safe.

If they look at Myspace to find out if students are doing bad things, that is different. That is not right. But if they are trying to keep students safe, that is okay.

School officials should not look at Myspace just to get students in trouble. But if they see something that could help keep the school safe, then that is okay.

People should be careful about what they put on the internet. Things can come back to hurt you. 

School shootings are bad. Schools try to stop them. They do drills to practice staying safe. 

School officials are trying to keep the school safe.

The war is hard. After nine eleven, I want to fight. I want to make them hurt like they hurt us. But now I think we made a big mistake. We went to war without a plan. We did not know what to do.

The people there always fight with each other. They cannot be our friends. We cannot help them. War is different for them. They are wild. They want us to leave.

We should leave. We went there for revenge. The people wanted it. The president made the war. We had to do something after nine eleven. We could not let them get away with it.

We did not know what to do after the war. We did not have a plan. We did not have a goal. We were angry. We made things worse.

We cannot change them. They are always going to be like this. We should leave. Staying there does not help. It hurts us.

The Catholic Church needs to change some things. Many people are leaving the Church. They think the Church is not accepting of many things. For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. 

The Church's views are old. They need to think in new ways. If they do, they will not lose people. Many people disagree with the Church on these things. They feel the Church is wrong. If a person believes in abortion, they may not want to be in the Church. If a person believes in gay marriage, they may not want to be in the Church.

The Church says priests are married to God. They give their lives to God. But everyone else has a job and a family. Why can't priests have both?

I think gay marriage is good. People should not be sad if they are gay.  They are born this way.

I think it is wrong to say that only men and women can marry. Gay men and women should have the same right.

People are born different. Some are born straight. Some are born gay. It is not a choice.

The government should not say what people can do in love. It is a personal thing.

I think gay marriage good.

Many people say gay couples bad for family. But it is different.

Gay couples have same rights as other couples.

If gay couples can not see sick partner, that is not fair.

Study show gay couples happy like other couples.

Gay couples want marriage paper from the government, not church.

Church and government should be separate.

Some say gay marriage bad for children.

But gay children same as other children.

Government should help gay couples.

Gay marriage is legal in all states.

President Bush say no to gay marriage.

He say it bad for morals.

Morals are different for each person.

Government should not make law based on one group's beliefs.

Some people say gay people sick. But this not true.

People should listen to experts, not just friends or church.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many medicines. Some medicines are good. Some medicines are bad. Some medicines are against the law.  

Just because a medicine is against the law does not mean it is not good.

Some medicines are good for helping people. These medicines are called "controlled substances."

We use these medicines in the pharmacy. We use them to help people.

Marijuana is against the law. But it can also be good for some people.

If we use marijuana to help people, it can be good.

Alcohol is also bad if you use too much. But it is legal.

Marijuana should be legal if it can help people.

We should not be afraid of marijuana. It is not as bad as some other drugs.

If people know marijuana can help, they will use it more carefully.

The church has become more modern. It is not as strict as it used to be.

When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I would wear a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends every Sunday. We would go to church together.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is shorter, and people dress more casually. In summer, some people come in their beach clothes. 

Even at the morning mass, where I used to dress up, people now wear jeans and khakis. 

The biggest change is how people dress.

I do not know much about the politics of the church.

I think the pedophilia problem could not be prevented by allowing women priests or married priests. Some men who are married become pedophiles.

I think it is a choice to become a priest. There are other religions where priests can be married. If someone wants to practice their faith and be married, they should consider another religion.

The Iraq War is hard. It make me angry.

After September 11th, the Bush team said Iraq was bad. They said Iraq had bad things and was with the bad people who did September 11th. They lied.

I feel the Bush team lied to people. Even Colin Powell said he did not know if the bad things about Iraq were true. I think this is wrong. It is wrong to lie to people.

The Bush team does not care about the rules of the country. They want to be very strong.

The Bush team wanted to go to war. They may have wanted oil from Iraq. That is not right.

I think the war is too long. If we leave now, there may be more fighting.

The United Nations wants to help Iraq. They want other countries to help, like Syria and Saudi Arabia. But I do not know if this is good.

Iraq should be its own country. But the government is weak. The leader of Iraq does not have much power.

There are many groups in Iraq. They want power. They fight with each other. This is bad.

The war in Iraq is hard to talk about. I do not know much about it. It began after the big attacks on America in nine eleven. I think many people felt angry and wanted to get back at Iraq. 

I do not like war. I do not think it is fair. We should not call it a war if Congress did not say it was a war. We should not use guns to show we are big and strong.

I think we should help Iraq, but staying there is hard. It is like we are trying to make them like us. It may not work. We should not try to force our beliefs on them.

Many families have children in Iraq. I feel bad for them. But I also worry that staying too long will make things worse. Iraq is a different place with a different way of life.

I think the war will go on for a long time. It is a sad situation.

The writer does not think the government should make laws about what churches can do. The writer says the constitution says the government and church should be separate.  The writer thinks it is wrong to make a law to say what is good or bad for churches.

The writer thinks it is wrong to make a law about this. The writer says it would be the only law that stops people from doing things instead of stopping the government. The writer thinks the government should not tell churches what to do.

The writer says the government should not be involved in this issue. The writer thinks the president is doing this because he does not like this. The writer thinks it is unfair to make a law because of one person's beliefs. The writer thinks churches should make this decision, not the government.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the real reasons for the war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th, but these things were not really connected. The government made people afraid after September 11th and used this to start the war.

I am against war, especially when a country attacks first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should have learned from the mistakes they made in Vietnam. Many American soldiers died in Iraq.

The government took away the Iraqi government and did not plan for what would happen next. This created chaos.

The United States tried to make Iraq a democracy, like they tried to do in Vietnam. This is a hard thing to do.

The government did not plan for the long war in Iraq. They did not think it would be hard to make Iraq a democracy. They made it seem easy.

The war in Iraq is hard. We are still there. Many American soldiers are still there, and many have died. The United States is trying to teach Iraqis to control their own country, but this takes a long time. 

It is hard to know what to do. We cannot just leave Iraq, because we took away their government. But we cannot keep fighting forever. How many more soldiers must die?

Maybe the war is about oil. The United States wants to control Iraq's oil. 

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but they were not found. Other countries have weapons of mass destruction, but the United States is not attacking them.

I hope the war ends soon and there is peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a personal choice. Some say it is in our genes, not just how we grow up. To give people less rights because of this is not fair. It is not right.

I think politics should not decide. This is a personal matter. It is between people and their families.

In my town, there are gay couples who live like other families. They walk their dogs, they are good neighbors.

I think it is wrong for the government to say who can marry. Marriage is for people to decide, not the government.

Some say being gay is in our genes, not a choice. This is like saying we choose our height or our hair color.

It is unfair that a gay couple cannot marry, but a straight couple can.

Marriage is a personal thing. People should be able to decide for themselves who to marry.

The internet is public.  When you put things on the internet, people can see them.

If you write about bad things, like hurting people, someone will tell the school. The school must act. They must keep students safe. 

It is hard to know if something on the internet is a joke or serious. Sometimes, people make harmless things that seem bad. Other times, people mean to hurt others.

The school may look at things on the internet if someone tells them about something bad.

You can’t control what people think. If you post something on the internet, people may think poorly of you.

It is not right for teachers to pretend to be students on the internet.

If you don’t want people to see something, don’t put it on the internet.

The war is long. I think it started with good reason. The goal was to help a country have democracy. But now, I think we do not have that goal. Maybe we are just fighting to show we are strong.

I also think the reasons we started the war may have been wrong. George Bush’s father had problems with Saddam Hussein before. This may have made us start the war.

If we wanted to give democracy to a country without one, that would be good. But if we had other reasons, that is not fair.

The war has gone on for many years. I think we showed our power at the start. But now it is too long.

If we wanted to help people who had a bad leader, that is a good reason to fight. But now our reasons are not clear. We seem to be fighting just to fight.

The war is too long. It should stop. The people in that country must take care of themselves.

We waste money on the war. We have problems here at home, like poverty. We should use the money to help people here.

We spend a lot of money on war. This money could be used for better things, like schools, roads, and health care. We have problems in our own country. We should spend money on those.

We are sending our people to die in a war that we do not have a good reason for.

My friend said her high school stopped students from using Myspace.  I thought that was strange. I do not know if that is a good idea. I do not know if the school has the right to say what the students can do on the internet.

I think people should be careful about what they put on the internet. Many people can see it. If you put things on Myspace, many people can see it. You should think about this before you post.  

If you are worried about people seeing your Myspace, you should not post much. I do not have a Myspace, but I have a Facebook. I worry about people who might see bad things on my Facebook.

The Iraq War was a bad idea. Many people think this. Polls show most people in the world think it was a bad idea. Most Iraqis think we should leave. Many U.S. soldiers think this too. The war has been bad from the start. Leaving will also be hard. It is difficult to solve problems in the Middle East. 

The United States and Middle Eastern countries have different ways of life. The United States government thought it could bring democracy to Iraq. But this is not the way Iraqis want to live.

Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. But we should think about the good and bad before we go to war with a country. The war in Iraq has been bad. It is like quicksand. We should leave Iraq.

The Iraqi people want us to leave. They know what is best for their country. If we leave, it will be their choice. If things go bad, we can say we tried to help but they chose to leave. 

We may never be seen as good guys in the Middle East. But leaving would be better than staying.

Yes, I think there is still problem with how people treat men and women differently in the United States. 

It is not just a problem for women. I think it depends on the kind of work a person does. 

Women may have more problems. There is a thing called the "glass ceiling." Even with equality, it is hard for women to get to the top jobs.

Sometimes, a board of people will not pick a woman for a job even if she is very good. This is because people think that women should not be in charge. 

Men can have problems too. For example, if a man wants to stay home to take care of his children, people sometimes think it is strange.

In the fashion world, men may not be taken seriously. People may think that men do not know much about fashion.


It is hard to change these things because people have strong ideas about how men and women should be. We have come a long way, but change is slow. 

More women are getting high jobs and more men are staying home with their children. People are starting to accept these things more.

To make things better, we must show the good qualities of people who are different. We must not push too hard, but show that they are good at their jobs. 

Change takes time. We have come a long way. We need to keep working to make things better.

Drug laws are changing.

Some places have made a change called decriminalization. This means a drug is no longer a crime. It is like a traffic ticket.

A person caught with the drug will not be arrested. They may be given a fine.

There are good and bad parts to this change.

Some people say it saves money. It costs money to arrest, hold, and try people in court. 

Decriminalization saves money for the government.

Other people say there are bad things about it. Some jobs will not hire people with drug charges. This can make it hard to find a job.

Denver is a city that decriminalized marijuana. They say they have more money now for schools and helping people.

Some people think marijuana should be legal like alcohol. Others think it should not be sold everywhere.

Everyone reacts to drugs differently. Some people are careful. Other people use drugs too much.

Marijuana and alcohol both have bad effects.

It is hard to say if decriminalization is good or bad.

I say yes.

Many things the church does are old. They do them for long time. It is good to be old. But it is good to change also. Many Catholics go to church each week. They are strict about how things are done.

Sometimes I think the church looks down on people who are not perfect. They do not accept people who are not Catholic. They do not accept people of other religions. For example, my dad was not Catholic. My mom was Catholic. They would not marry them in the church. This is not loving. The church teaches to love others. But they do not accept others like this.

The church tells you to do things. But the church does not do them. The rules are old. They stay old. I think priests should be able to marry. But this would not stop bad things. Bad things happen for many reasons.

Some people hurt children. They do this no matter if they are married or not. Allowing priests to marry will not stop this.

This is a hard question for me. I do not have all the answers. I do not think one side is right or wrong. This is a very hard issue. It is about the church and the state. It is also about what marriage is. This is hard because we must be kind to everyone. 

I think all unions should be equal. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government. Marriage is special to some people. People do not get tax breaks or special treatment from the government just because they are baptized.

If two people are married, the government should see it as a civil union. That is what it is: two people together. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is. 

If all the states agree on a law, then it should be a law for the whole country. But changing the constitution to ban gay marriage is not right. The constitution should not be changed for this. It is important to some people, but not important enough to change the constitution.

It is not right to change the constitution to ban gay marriage.

I grew up in a home where people practice Christianity. So, my view on homosexuality is not easy. I have friends who are gay. I do not agree with their way of life. But I think it is right for them to marry. I do not think the whole country should decide on this. I think each state should decide.

Some states have many people who vote for the Democratic party. Some states have many people who vote for the Republican party. Democratic states want to allow gay marriage. If you live in a Democratic state, you know how they feel. You chose to live there. I do not think you can disagree with their choice.

I think gay people should have the same chances as straight people. I think they should be able to marry. Each state should decide this, not the president.

The president should not tell every state what to do. He does not live in every state. I think some things are better left to each state. The president will leave office soon. If a new president wants to allow gay marriage, it will be back and forth. It is better for each state to decide. They are the ones who will have to live with the choice.

Myspace is for people to see. If you put something on Myspace, others can see it. School officials have the right to see this. They want to make sure the school is safe. 

If the school can stop a shooting, that is good. School officials have a duty to keep students safe.

If they look at Myspace to find out if students are doing bad things, that is different. That is not right. But if they are trying to keep students safe, that is okay.

School officials should not look at Myspace just to get students in trouble. But if they see something that could help keep the school safe, then that is okay.

People should be careful about what they put on the internet. Things can come back to hurt you. 

School shootings are bad. Schools try to stop them. They do drills to practice staying safe. 

School officials are trying to keep the school safe.

The war is hard. After nine eleven, I want to fight. I want to make them hurt like they hurt us. But now I think we made a big mistake. We went to war without a plan. We did not know what to do.

The people there always fight with each other. They cannot be our friends. We cannot help them. War is different for them. They are wild. They want us to leave.

We should leave. We went there for revenge. The people wanted it. The president made the war. We had to do something after nine eleven. We could not let them get away with it.

We did not know what to do after the war. We did not have a plan. We did not have a goal. We were angry. We made things worse.

We cannot change them. They are always going to be like this. We should leave. Staying there does not help. It hurts us.
